Reviews.Title: will fade quickly
Reviews.Author: Hans
Reviews.Content: I bought these signs about 4 month ago. At first a was disappointed about the small size, but used them anyhow on the outside of my home. But now I need to replace them because they are totally faded and unreadable. Save your money and get something made from metal if you use it outside.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: drwang84
Reviews.Content: For the purpose of showing that we have a security camera, this works. It is held up by a suction cup. Unfortunately, it is made out of plastic. When it arrived, the metal hooks scratched the plastic and parts of the sign showed the ink being scratched off the sign. Wish it was metal but for the price it's ok.

Reviews.Title: So far so good...
Reviews.Author: Andrea Leilani
Reviews.Content: I put these up at my workplace and I'm sure it's the safe neighborhood or multiple surveillance cameras put but, but so far so good!

Reviews.Title: Faded badly
Reviews.Author: bigbaldguy
Reviews.Content: Even in a fairly sheltered area these signs have faded very quickly after only a year and I suspect will be unreadable in another year.

Reviews.Title: Needs to be bigger
Reviews.Author: Bruce Hartzell
Reviews.Content: It's a little hard to see from the end of the driveway and doesn't illuminate well in low light situations.  Could use a larger size if it were offered for sale.

Reviews.Title: Cheap! Cheap! Cheap!
Reviews.Author: Jerryspc
Reviews.Content: If I could give it no stars, I would.  The signs faded in two weeks, now you can barely read them. Save your money, they are crap.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Jackiebug09
Reviews.Content: These were a good value, they were shipped quickly but i did find them a bit small. The color still catches attention so they've been good.

Reviews.Title: The sign does the job.
Reviews.Author: Randall Crum
Reviews.Content: I buy these signs to go along with my security system which actually does have a camera system.  I think it is an excellent method of determent.

Reviews.Title: Flimsy
Reviews.Author: SGonzo
Reviews.Content: Lightweight plastic, you can see through it is so flimsy. Lettering rather blurry. POOR QUALITY, stay clear of this product

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: coach mike
Reviews.Content: It's plastic, a little flimsy and fades quickly in the sun, but it gets the message across and people do notice it.

Reviews.Title: Security, Nothing Fancy
Reviews.Author: R. Hagelberg
Reviews.Content: Good signs at a fair price.  I have these posted in several locations around my property.  They are fairly sturdy and easy to attach to a fence or deck post.

Reviews.Title: faded after 6 months of outdoor use
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Neff "food eater"
Reviews.Content: if using outside go with something metal, if indoors should work fine. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8

Reviews.Title: Fades quickly
Reviews.Author: Simdude
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these in August of 2012 and put one on my mailbox. It has fairly strong sun for most of the day and the sign has now faded to a light "orange". It did hold up well to a New England winter that included a blizzard the completely buried the mailbox and sign for over a month. The sign was well supported from the back however. It if wasn't for the fading, I would give it a much higher review. I will probably try the second sign in a shaded area to see if I have better luck.

Reviews.Title: Fade too quick
Reviews.Author: giampiero gassoso
Reviews.Content: I bought these signs to put on my fence . Look nice and bright when I received  them. In less than a few months they faded away to where I had to change them. No good for outside use, because they fade fast in sun light. Disappointed.

Reviews.Title: discolored quickly
Reviews.Author: juan
Reviews.Content: turned yellow about  a month after i got it. I have another that's in the shade, it seems to be ok, but definitely not for outdoor use.

Reviews.Title: Thin and cheap looking
Reviews.Author: Eugene M. Field "referee5038"
Reviews.Content: I received 2 signs quickly after ordering but they are so thin that light can be seen through them. They look okay but the material will not stand up to sun, heat, cold.

Reviews.Title: Item Faded in the sun after only a few weeks, I bought 4 of these and they all faded fast!
Reviews.Author: wpres658
Reviews.Content: Item Faded in the sun after only a few weeks, I bought 4 of these and they all faded fast!

Reviews.Title: Indoor use only!
Reviews.Author: DJ_PopeyeOne
Reviews.Content: I put 2 of these signs outside on a fence and they have faded to pink after only 3 months.

Reviews.Title: ok film on it is not good
Reviews.Author: ronald
Reviews.Content: ok film on it is not good and the things that hold it up do not work had to use tape.

Reviews.Title: Sign
Reviews.Author: Judy O
Reviews.Content: Good quality sign, would have like a bigger size option, about 1/3 larger as it is to be used outside, but acceptable.

Reviews.Title: OK Signs but smaller and thinner than expected
Reviews.Author: Carguy100
Reviews.Content: Signs seem to be smaller than I would have liked and the plastic is thinner than I would prefer.On the plus side they do include a suction cup holder with a hook for each sign.I would have given them 4 or 5 stars if they used thicker plastic and made the signs about 2 inches or so larger.Still I like these signs better than some of them I saw at a local big box home center and you get two of thesefor the price of one of those.  Maybe I should have given them 4 stars based on the price alone?

Reviews.Title: Fades Quickly
Reviews.Author: MrsCls
Reviews.Content: Signs are fading after less than a month. Don't waste your money. I wish I would have read the reviews before purchasing.

ProductInfo.Features:
2pcs pack surveillance warning sign-English
Weatherproof plastic material sign
Dim: 8.48" H x 8.45" W
ProductInfo.Name: SecurityMan SIGN2PK-EN Surveillance Camera with Warning Sign in English (2 pack)
